data.text: Ia nɨghnɨgh, Afeziar Ekiam bar e gifuegha en dɨghorim gami. Egha ziar kam, Godɨn boriba, e gatɨ. Ezɨ guizbangɨra, e an boribara. Nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba God gɨfozir puvatɨ, me kamaghɨn uaghan e gɨfozir puvatɨ.

3:2 Rom 8:18; 8:29; 1 Korin 15:49; 2 Korin 3:18; Filipai 3:21; Kolosi 3:4; 2 Pita 1:4Nan adarasi, e datɨrɨghɨn Godɨn boriba. Egha e fozir puvatɨ, e gɨn manmaghɨn otivam. God bizir kam tɨghar en akagham. E kamaghɨn fo, Krais uamategh nguazir kamɨn izɨtɨ, e uan damazibar deravɨra an ganam. Egh an mɨn otogham.
Gumazamizir an mɨn otivamin dughiam bagha mɨzua gariba, me Iesus zuezɨ moghɨn me uari zue.
Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me Godɨn akaba batosi. Arazir kuram, kar Godɨn akaba batozir arazim.

3:5 Aisaia 53:5-6; 53:11; Jon 1:29; 2 Korin 5:21; 1 Timoti 1:15; Hibru 4:15; 1 Pita 2:22-24; 1 Jon 2:2Ia bar fo, Iesus en arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa, nguazir kamɨn ize. Ezɨ ia fo, an arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ.

3:6 Rom 6:1-2; 6:14; 1 Jon 2:4; 3:9; 4:8; 3 Jon 1:11E kamaghɨn fo, gumazitam o amizitam Krais ko ikɨ, arazir kurabar amuvɨra ikian kogham. Egh gumazitam o amizitam arazir kurabar amuvɨra ikɨtɨ, e fogh suam, a guizbangɨra Kraisɨn ganigha a gɨfozir puvatɨ. A guizbangɨra Krais gɨfozir puvatɨ, Krais a tina.
Nan boriba, ia uari bagh gan, gumazitam o amizitam ia gifaraghtɨ, ia an gɨn mangan markɨ. Gumazir arazir aghuibagh amiba, me Iesus Godɨn damazimɨn derazɨ moghɨn, me Godɨn damazimɨn dera.

3:8 Luk 10:18; Jon 8:44; 16:11; Hibru 2:14Satan faraghavɨra arazir kurabagh amua iza datɨrɨkɨn. Kamaghɨn e fo, tina arazir kurabagh ami, a Satanɨn borim. Godɨn Otarim Satanɨn ingangarim gasɨghasɨghasa nguazir kamɨn ize.

3:9 1 Pita 1:23; 1 Jon 5:18Gumazitam o amizitam Godɨn borimɨn otoghtɨma, Godɨn Duam an navir averiamɨn aven angamɨra ikɨtɨ, an arazir kurabar amuvɨra ikian kogham. A Godɨn borimɨn otoghɨva, egh kamaghɨn an arazir kurabar amuvɨra ikian kogham.

3:10 1 Jon 2:29; 4:8Tina arazir aghuim gamir puvatɨ, a Godɨn borim puvatɨ. Egh tina Godɨn borir igharazibagh ifongezir puvatɨ, a uaghan Godɨn borim puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn e fo, te Godɨn boriba, ezɨ te Satanɨn boriba.

Kar akar ia fomɨra oragha iza datɨrɨghɨn tuzim: E uari gifuegham. E Keinɨn arazim damuan markiam. A Satanɨn borim, egha uan dozim mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Egha a tizim bagha uan dozim mɨsoghezɨ, an areme? An araziba ikuvizɨma, an dozimɨn araziba dera. Kamaghɨn a uan dozim mɨsoghezɨ an areme.
3:13 Matyu 5:11-12; Jon 15:18-19; 17:14; 2 Timoti 3:12Nan adarasi, nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba ia gifueghan koghtɨma, ia dɨgavir kuram damuan markɨ.

3:14 Jon 5:24; 1 Jon 2:9-11E Godɨn borir igharazibagh ifonge. Kamaghɨn e fo, e ariaghirir tuavim ategha, ariaghirezir gumazamiziba puvatɨ, e angamɨra itir tuavimɨn zui. Tina Godɨn borir igharazitam gifongezir puvatɨ, an ariaghirir tuavimɨn zui.

3:15 Matyu 5:21-22; Galesia 5:21; Akar Mogomem 21:8Tina gumazamizir igharazitabagh ifongeghan kogh mati gumazir gumazamizibav sozim. Ia fo gumazir gumazamizibav soziba, me ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim inian kogham.
Iesus e gifongegha, e bagha uabɨ makunigha aremezɨ, e kamaghɨn Godɨn borir igharazibagh ifueghamin arazim gɨfo. Egh e uaghan Godɨn borir igharaziba bagh uari makunam.

3:17 Godɨn Araziba 15:7; Luk 3:11; 1 Jon 4:20Tav nguazir kamɨn biziba ikɨtɨ, Godɨn borir igharazim biziba puvatɨghtɨ, an an ganɨva, egh an apangkuvan koghɨva, egh an akurvazir puvatɨ, a Godɨn ifofer arazim an itir puvatɨ.

3:18 Rom 12:9; Jems 2:15-16; 1 Pita 1:22Nan boriba, e Godɨn borir igharaziba pura mɨgeir akabar me gifueghan kogham. Kamaghɨn markɨ. E guizbangɨra uan naviba me danɨngɨva, egh arazir aghuibar me damuam.

E Godɨn borir igharazibagh ifongezir arazir kam damuva, e fogh suam, e guizɨn akamɨn gɨn zui. God en navir averiamɨn itir biziba bar dagh fo, egha an apangkuvir en itim bar ekevegha, e uarira uarir apangkuvir arazim gafira. Egh en navir averiaba suam, ia ikufi, dughiar kamɨn e Godɨn borir igharazibagh ifongezir arazir kam damuva, e fogh suam, e Godɨn damazimɨn navir amɨrizim iti.
Nan adarasi, en navir averiaba kamaghɨn e mɨkɨman kogham, ia ikufi, eghtɨ e Godɨn damazimɨn atiatingan kogham.
3:22 Onger Akaba 34:15; Jeremaia 29:12; Matyu 7:8; 21:22; Jon 9:31; 14:13E Godɨn Akar Gavgavibar gɨn mangɨva a ifongezir arazibar amuva, kamaghɨn e bizitam bagh an azangsɨghtɨ, an e danɨngam.

3:23 Jon 6:29; 13:34; 15:12; 15:17; 17:3; 1 Tesalonika 4:9; 1 Pita 4:8; 1 Jon 2:8-10Kar an Akar Gavgavir ekiam: e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an Otarim Krais Iesusɨn ikiam. Egh an e mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, e uari uarigh ifuegham.
3:24 Jon 14:23; 15:10; 17:21; Rom 8:9; 1 Jon 4:12-13Tina an Akar Gavgavibar gɨn mangɨva, Godɨn poroghtɨ, God an poroghɨv ikiam. God uan Duam e ganɨngizɨ, an Duar kam en akazɨ, e fo, God e ko iti.
